400_default_message: Request parsing error, please confirm whether the request format is correct. Please use the multipart header for uploading files, and use JSON format for parameters.
401_default_message: Request parsing error, please confirm whether the request format is correct. Please use the multipart header for uploading files, and use JSON format for parameters.
404_default_message: The route is not defined, please confirm whether the url and request method are correct
403_default_message: Insufficient permissions, please make sure you have the corresponding permissions
422_default_message: Request processing failed, please check the value of error
500_default_message: Internal server error, please try again later
validationError_default_message: Request verification failed, please see errors for details
users_validate_page: The value of the current page number is a number between 1-1000
users_validate_sort: Sort fields only support id, created_at, updated_at
users_validate_order: The collation only supports asc (positive order), desc (reverse order)
users_validate_per_page: The value of the number of entries per page is between 2 and 100
category_validate_name_min_cn: 名称长度需至少 2 个字
category_validate_name_max_cn: 名称长度不能超过 8 个字
category_validate_description_min_cn: 描述长度需至少 3 个字
category_validate_description_max_cn: 描述长度不能超过 255 个字
